attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Resign on the basis that 
1.the economy is out of control eg
2. escalating food prices
3. Fuel prices spirralling out of control
4. Cost of living out of control
5. The Labour Party have lost Public confidence

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saveenglandnow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
